00050 :      whiteIntensity(1)

00076 template <typename SourcePixel, typename DestPixel, typename CalcPixel>

00097 template <>
00098 inline float TPixelConversion<quint8, float, float>::operator()(const quint8& pixel) const
00099 {
00100        return pixel / 255.0f;
00101 }
00102

00105 inline float TPixelConversion<quint8, float, float>::GetCalc(const quint8& pixel) const

00111 template <>
00112 inline quint8 TPixelConversion<float, quint8, float>::operator()(const float& pixel) const
00113 {

00116 
00117 
00118 template <>
00119 inline quint8 TPixelConversion<float, quint8, float>::GetDest(const float& pixel) const
